item.description: Escada cordially invites Boston City Girls to an evening of champagne and shopping! Join us at the Escada Boutique at 308 Boylston Street Boston, MA on Thursday, December 27th from 6-8pm. Come view our beautiful new 2013 Resort collection while you sip champagne and snack on sweets! We also have an amazing sale on our entire Fall Winter collection with prices 60-70% off! With New Year's Eve around the corner, this is a perfect chance to grab a great new party dress while sipping, snacking, and socializing! We hope to see you there!
item.name: Champagne and Shopping
